posts.post_content: The cost is what breaks it. At ![4](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=4&type=symbol) it would have been fine, even great. posts.post_content: I love artifact decks and play them almost exclusively, but this and [Voltaic Key](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Voltaic Key) being in the same set just before Scars of Mirrodin, which presumably will be artifact-heavy, makes me a little nervous about the metagame.
